name: Robot Survival [GGJ21]
description:
Poor robot got wrecked by human scums. Without any sensors or modules left, you must crawl to gather back your robot dignity. Explore the dump island where you were thrown, and find "new" robot parts that can help you escape this filthy place.

Global Game Jame link : https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/robot-survival-6
